TopicTitle: [1.8+] Custom Barn Kit 1.1.20 (19 October 2019) - Parachute Included

Articles.Content: what version shoul I install for ksp 1.3.1 in my <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> RP- 1 install?

Hey [@sarbian](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/57146-sarbian/), I'm going to be doing a Strategia release in the next couple days, and it looks like there's a 1.1.18 of CBK hiding in Jenkins.  Is this just a case of the thread being out of date, or is there more testing you wanted to do for this?
It is the same code but built for 1.5

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, sarbian said:
> 
> 
> It is the same code but built for 1.5
> 

I figured as much - what I should've said is that this thread only links to 1.1.17, whereas KSP-AVC reports 1.1.18 is out there, but with a broken download link to this thread (because of how the forum software started handling shortened links a while back).  So most users won't be able to find 1.1.18, and KSP-AVC users will get extra confused.

> 
> 
> On 12/12/2018 at 1:43 PM, nightingale said:
> 
> 
> I figured as much - what I should've said is that this thread only links to 1.1.17, whereas KSP-AVC reports 1.1.18 is out there, but with a broken download link to this thread (because of how the forum software started handling shortened links a while back).  So most users won't be able to find 1.1.18, and KSP-AVC users will get extra confused.
> 

The Jenkins page with the d/ls is here:  [https://ksp.sarbian.com/jenkins/job/CustomBarnKit/](https://ksp.sarbian.com/jenkins/job/CustomBarnKit/)

v1.1.19

- orbitDisplayMode is now an array and you can start without the ability to see any orbits. See the default file comments

Downloads :

[CustomBarnKit-1.1.19.0.zip](https://ksp.sarbian.com/jenkins/job/CustomBarnKit/40/artifact/CustomBarnKit-1.1.19.0.zip)

It seems it was fixed.

[@sarbian](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/57146-sarbian/), is it possible to use this to move craftSizeLimit from LAUNCHPAD to <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>?  I'd like to make <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>/<abbr title="SpacePlane Hangar">SPH</abbr> level determine size limit with the launchpad/runway levels only setting mass limit.  I really dislike the part count mechanic. 

Thanks
It's possible to fully disable the parachutes? I've tried putting level 6, but then they always have the parachutes.
Ok, Maybe im dumb but i have no clue how to use this mod. is there a menu? or?

You have to write a config for it.  There is a default config linked in the <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr> (the default mirrors Vanilla, so on it's own with no changes you'll see no differences)

Hi all -  

I am using the "Unkerballed" tech tree and have used <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">Ckan</abbr> to install the mentioned tech tree, this mod is listed as a "dependency" and I am curious if there is a patch that I can apply that will set the action groups back to default as I think I am getting all AG due to this mod?

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, ble210 said:
> 
> 
> I'm trying to modify the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> build limit, and set the astronauts to a fixed cost.  I've created a config titled "CustomBarnKit.cfg", with the following text (below).  Yet nothing changes in-game.  Any advice would be appreciated!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> @CUSTOMBARNKIT  
> 
> {  
> 
>     @<abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr>  
> 
>     {  
> 
>         @partCountLimit = 40, 255, -1  
> 
>     }  
> 
>     @ASTRONAUTS  
> 
>     {  
> 
>         @recruitHireFixedRate = true  
> 
>     }  
> 
> }
> 

I figured out my problem- the config file I was working off of to create the above file was a DISABLED file.  I fixed it and now everything works great.

v.1.1.20

- KSP 1.8
- Fix a bug that would reset the buildings levels when using the "Switch Editor" button

Downloads :

[CustomBarnKit-1.1.20.0.zip](https://ksp.sarbian.com/jenkins/job/CustomBarnKit/43/artifact/CustomBarnKit-1.1.20.0.zip)
Is v.1.1.20 only compatible to KSP 1.8 or 1.7.x, too?

> 
> 
> 55 minutes ago, New Horizons said:
> 
> 
> Is v.1.1.20 only compatible to KSP 1.8 or 1.7.x, too?
> 

With the large change in KSP from 1.7.3 to 1.8, don't expect any mod with .dll's that was made for one to truly properly work with the other.  It may appear to, but there is a large risk it isn't.
What does this mod actually do? Is it a rebalance of the career features? Because I don't wan't that. I just wanted new strategies, but Strategia has this as dependency.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Azzinoth said:
> 
> 
> What does this mod actually do? Is it a rebalance of the career features? Because I don't wan't that. I just wanted new strategies, but Strategia has this as dependency.
> 

This mod makes it possible for other mods to modify stuff. Don’t worry, if you install this with strategia you’ll get what you ordered.
